Deleting a Proposal Template permanently removes them from the Proposal Template List.

examples.title: Create Template from Proposal
body:
curl 'https://www.wixapis.com/proposals-templates/templates/v1/{template_id}' \
  -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json'

Record Template usage to create a Proposal

*
Updates extended fields of a Proposal without incrementing revision.

params.name: template

params.name: fieldMask
params.doc:
Set of fields to update.

Fields that aren't included in `fieldMask.paths` are ignored.

members.name: percentage
members.doc: Percentage of full amount to pay (if splitting by percentages is used).

members.name: amount
members.doc: Deposit amount, must be less than amount.

members.name: usePercentage
members.doc: Use percentages for the displaying deposit, payment provider will receive amount with flag that it should show as percentage.

members.name: dueDateOffset
members.doc: Offset in days when payment is due after payment request is issued.

members.name: dueDateOffset
members.doc: Offset in days when payment is due after payment request is issued.

members.name: issueDateOffset
members.doc: Offset in days from previous payment request due date or proposal acceptance date (for the first schedule) when payment request is issued.

members.name: percentage
members.doc: Percentage of full amount to pay (used to represent percentage amount of full proposal amount).

members.name: usePercentage
members.doc: Use percentages to split total proposal amount to schedules.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.  
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

Learn more about [extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields).

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type struct

members.name: namespaces
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.  
Extended field data. Each key corresponds to the namespace of the app that created the extended fields.
The value of each key is structured according to the schema defined when the extended fields were configured.

You can only access fields for which you have the appropriate permissions.

Learn more about [extended fields](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields).

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of tax against which the calculation was performed.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Rate at which this tax detail was calculated.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Amount of tax for this tax detail.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated.

members.name: code
members.doc: Additional fee's unique code (or ID) for future processing.

members.name: priceBeforeTax
members.doc: Additional fee's price before tax calculations.

members.name: price
members.doc: Additional fee's final price after tax calculations.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: Optional - Line items associated with this additional fee.

members.name: taxable
members.doc: Indication if additional fee is taxable or not.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate %, as a decimal point between 0 and 1.

members.name: rateBreakdown
members.doc: If breakdown exists, the sum of rates in the breakdown must equal `tax_rate`.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of line item the discount applies to.

docs.summary: Used for grouping line items. Sent when an item is added to a cart, checkout, or order.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within the catalog it belongs to.

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog.

You can get your app's ID from its page in the [Wix Dev Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).

For items from Wix catalogs, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`
+ Wix Restaurants: `"9a5d83fd-8570-482e-81ab-cfa88942ee60"`

members.name: options
members.doc:
Additional item details in key:value pairs.

 Use this optional field to specify a variant of the item or add custom details. There are several ways to use `options`:
 + Pass specific information about the item variant in this field. For example, size and color of an item of clothing: `"options": {"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}`.
 + Create a separate API for creating item variants that stores the details and generates a unique ID for each item variant. Then pass only the variant ID in this field. For example: `"options": {"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}`.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
Optional reference to the line item's origin catalog.
 See [Catalog SPI](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/catalog-spi/introduction) for more details.
 This field is empty in the case of a custom line item.

members.name: price
members.doc: In case line item is from eCom catalog, price is after catalog discount and automatic discounts.

members.name: itemType
members.doc: Item type. Either a preset type or custom. Used in tax calculations to determine tax region.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after discounts and after tax.

members.name: price
members.doc: Catalog price after catalog discount and automatic discounts.

members.name: priceBeforeDiscounts
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **after** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: lineItemPrice
members.doc: Total price **after** catalog-defined discount and line item discounts.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc: Item price **before** line item discounts and **before** catalog-defined discount. Defaults to `price` when not provided.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate %, as a decimal point between 0 and 1.

members.name: rateBreakdown
members.doc: If breakdown exists, the sum of rates in the breakdown must equal `tax_rate`.

members.name: appDefId
members.doc: Proposal editor provider app def id.

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc:
Template image url
 Categories of the proposal.
  repeated string categories = 9 [(wix.api.readOnly) = true]; TODO: add categories at later date, when we decide what to do with them

members.name: counter
members.doc: Number of times the template was used to create a Proposal

members.name: lastUsed
members.doc: Date and time the proposal template was last used to create a Proposal

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the proposal template was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the proposal template was last updated.

members.name: locale
members.doc: Locale used to describe proposal's template language

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: cursor
members.doc:
Pointer to the next or previous page in the list of results.

You can get the relevant cursor token
from the `pagingMetadata` object in the previous call's response.
Not relevant for the first request.

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: filter
sort
members.doc:
Sort object in the following format:
`[{"fieldName":"sortField1","order":"ASC"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","order":"DESC"}]`

members.name: fields
members.doc: Array of projected fields. A list of specific field names to return. If `fieldsets` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Array of named, predefined sets of projected fields. A array of predefined named sets of fields to be returned. Specifying multiple `fieldsets` will return the union of fields from all sets. If `fields` are also specified, the union of `fieldsets` and `fields` is returned.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Paging options to limit and skip the number of items.

members.name: cursorPaging
members.doc: Cursor token pointing to a page of results. Not used in the first request. Following requests use the cursor token and not `filter` or `sort`.

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next page in the list of results.

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous page in the list of results.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: hasNext
members.doc:
Indicates if there are more results after the current page.
 If `true`, another page of results can be retrieved.
 If `false`, this is the last page.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the entity to update.

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Identifier for the app whose extended fields are being updated.

members.name: namespaceData
members.doc: Data to update. Structured according to the [schema](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/articles/getting-started/extended-fields#json-schema-for-extended-fields) defined when the extended fields were configured.

docs.summary:
Supported payment methods, will be expanded in the future Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_PAYMENT_METHOD
  • INVOICE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_SCHEDULE_TYPE
  • SINGLE_PAYMENT
  • MULTIPLE_PAYMENT

Possible values are:
  • GLOBAL
  • SPECIFIC_ITEMS
  • SHIPPING

Possible values are:
  • UNRECOGNISED
  • PHYSICAL
  • DIGITAL
  • GIFT_CARD
  • SERVICE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_REQUESTED_FIELD - Unknown.
  • BASIC - Template without note.
  • FULL - Template with note.
